message.content: It is difficult to provide a definitive answer as opinions on divorce can vary among women in Saint Lucia. However, it is generally observed that attitudes towards divorce have evolved over time. While some women may still hold traditional views that discourage divorce and prioritize maintaining the sanctity of marriage, there is a growing acceptance and understanding of the need for divorce in certain circumstances. Many women recognize that divorce can be a necessary step to escape abusive or unhappy marriages, and they prioritize their own well-being and that of their children. Additionally, societal changes, increased education, and exposure to different cultural influences have contributed to a more open-minded approach towards divorce among women in Saint Lucia.
